# Introduction

The project focuses on C. elegans and the changes occuring at multiple 
levels (chromatin accessibility, gene expression and protein levels) 
during aging. 

To build the HTML version of this set of files, you can use: 
```{r eval = FALSE}
    bookdown::render_book('01-Day1.Rmd', output_format = 'bookdown::gitbook')
```
